templateOptions.label: ApiKey
templateOptions.description: The ApiKey to connect to the API

templateOptions.label: HistoricalDays
templateOptions.description: The number of days in the past from which the workers and shifts will be imported.

templateOptions.label: ShiftDetailsStart
templateOptions.description: The number of days for which the shift details will be added as a contract rule.
